Riverside Drive, north from but not including 90th Street.
About 1891.
Ewing Galloway.

About 1891.

Ewing Galloway.

312 West 90th Street, south side, between Riverside Drive and West End Avenue.
About 1913.

312-314 West 90th Street, south side, between Riverside Drive and West End Avenue.
About 1913.

316-318 West 90th Street, south side, between Riverside Drive and West End Avenue.
About 1913.

Riverside Drive, east side, from 90th to but not including 91st Streets.
1923.

Gift of E. M. Jenks.

Riverside Park: The Hudson River Yacht Club at the foot of West 90th Street as viewed northeastward (No. 1) and southeastward (No. 2). Note in the latter the soldiers and Sailors Monument. This is on the west side of the Drive, at 89th Street.

The numerous apartment houses shown forming a "Gold Coast", line the easterly side of this thoroughfare and overlook both the park and the river.

July 11, 1931
Views: 1-2

P. L. Sperr

(3)

A view northward of the same locale, from a point near 88th Street.

P. L. Sperr

July 11, 1931
